name: Cluppets (itch)
description:
You are trapped in an endless labirynth with mysterious evil Cluppets lurking in every corner. Use the power of your third eye to see through the unknown.
Summon the spirit world and enter the reverse to harness it's energy against the darkness. Can you survive all the Cluppets and find a way out? ATTENTION!!! you can see through walls by right clicking to activate your Third Eye. I've seen people miss that and play the game blindly which makes it a lot harder.

FEATURES
-----------
* Many unique levels to get through
* Each level filled with new Cluppets to defeat
* Unique Third Eye ability let's you see through walls to know where your enemies are
* Don't let the Cluppets get you, run if you see them, find the Spirit Orb to defeat them
* Boss Cluppets provide an even greater challenge to overcome
* Multiple lives no continues
* Jump Scares
* Fast paced action
* First person perspective
